mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN event_type t ON t.EVT_TYPE_ID = e.EVT_TYPE_ID
mapper.select:
select e.EVENT_ID contactEvtId, e.EVENT_NBR contactEvtCode, e.EVENT_NAME contactEvtName, e.EVENT_DESC contactEvtDesc, t.EVT_TYPE_NAME contactEvtTypeName, e.STATUS_CD statusCd from event e
where 1=1
and e.EVENT_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{contactEvtName}),'%')
and e.EVT_TYPE_ID = #{contactEvtTypeId}
and e.EVENT_NBR LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{contactEvtCode}),'%')
ORDER BY e.UPDATE_DATE DESC

select distinct r.EVENT_ID contactEvtId, e.EVENT_NBR contactEvtCode, e.EVENT_NAME contactEvtName from mkt_evt_interface_rel r left join event e on e.EVENT_ID = r.EVENT_ID where r.CHANNEL_CODE = #{map.chlCode}
and e.EVENT_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{map.evtName},'%')

select distinct i.INTERFACE_CFG_ID interfaceId, i.INTERFACE_NAME interfaceName from interface_cfg i left join contact_channel c on c.CONTACT_CHL_ID = i.CALLER where c.CONTACT_CHL_CODE = #{map.chlCode}
and i.INTERFACE_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{map.intfName},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into event ( INTERFACE_CFG_ID, EVENT_NBR, EVENT_NAME, EVT_MAPPED_ADDR, EVT_MAPPED_IP, EVT_PROCOTOL_TYPE, EVT_MAPPED_FUN_NAME, EVENT_DESC, EVT_TYPE_ID, EVENT_TRIG_TYPE, EXT_EVENT_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values ( #{interfaceCfgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contactEvtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactEvtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtMappedAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtMappedIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtProcotolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtMappedFunName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactEvtDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactEvtTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{evtTrigType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extEventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into event ( INTERFACE_CFG_ID, EVENT_NBR, EVENT_NAME, EVT_MAPPED_ADDR, EVT_MAPPED_IP, EVT_PROCOTOL_TYPE, EVT_MAPPED_FUN_NAME, EVENT_DESC, EVT_TYPE_ID, EVENT_TRIG_TYPE, EXT_EVENT_ID, LOCATION_NBR, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, LOCATION_SWITCH, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REC_CAMPAIGN_AMOUNT, REMARK) values ( #{interfaceCfgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contactEvtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactEvtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtMappedAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtMappedIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtProcotolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtMappedFunName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactEvtDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactEvtTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{evtTrigType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extEventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{locationNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationSwitch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recCampaignAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update event set
INTERFACE_CFG_ID = #{interfaceCfgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
EVENT_NBR = #{contactEvtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVENT_NAME = #{contactEvtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVT_MAPPED_ADDR = #{evtMappedAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVT_MAPPED_IP = #{evtMappedIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVT_PROCOTOL_TYPE = #{evtProcotolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVT_MAPPED_FUN_NAME = #{evtMappedFunName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVENT_DESC = #{eventDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVT_TYPE_ID = #{evtTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
EVENT_TRIG_TYPE = #{eventTrigType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXT_EVENT_ID = #{extEventId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REC_CAMPAIGN_AMOUNT = #{recCampaignAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},
UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVENT_ID = #{contactEvtId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where EVENT_ID = #{contactEvtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.insert: insert into event (INTERFACE_CFG_ID, EVENT_NBR, EVENT_NAME, EVT_MAPPED_ADDR, EVT_MAPPED_IP, EVT_PROCOTOL_TYPE, EVT_MAPPED_FUN_NAME, EVENT_DESC, EVT_TYPE_ID, EVENT_TRIG_TYPE, EXT_EVENT_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REC_CAMPAIGN_AMOUNT, REMARK) values (#{interfaceCfgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contactEvtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactEvtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtMappedAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtMappedIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtProcotolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtMappedFunName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactEvtDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactEvtTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{evtTrigType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extEventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recCampaignAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
